info.title: Warnel Chawpiovs
info.author: Wololo
info.details: A card game based on a well known cooperative board game, with full rules enforcement, to play solo or (ultimately) multiplayer. Defeat villains with your team of heroes\nThese archives do not include resource files (images in particular). Resources will be automatically downloaded when the game starts (and it can take a while), unless you provide a separate "core.zip" file with those resources

changelog:
v1.1.0
Adds support for "The Mad Titan's Shadow" and "Captain America" Hero pack:

- New heroes : Adam Warlock, Spectrum, and Captain America
- New villains: Ebony Maw, Tower Defense, Thanos, Hela, and Loki
- Support for music and sound
- Various bug fixes

Note: MacOS build is untested

v1.0.0
- Adds support for "The Rise of Red Skull":
  - New heroes : Spider-Woman and Hawkeye
  - New villains: Absorbing Man, Crossbones, Taskmaster, Zola, Red skull
- "Adventure Mode" is a new gameplay feature (and now the default) in which you have to win games to unlock heroes/villains. It can be deactivated in the options to unlock everything directly
- The game is now much more "verbose" with popups that give details on what's going on. These can be dismissed for a given game by selecting "don't show this tip again" or entirely deactivated in the options (Options > Gameplay > Notifications > "Expert")
- "Text mode" is now considered playable. This allows to play if you can't or won't download image files. You might want to open the settings.json file and set "load_cards_online": falseÂ to avoid the game trying to download image resources on startup. (Note: you still need the set definitions to be downloaded from marvelcdb)
- Caped FPS to 60FPS
- Various bug fixes

Initial release. Supports 5 heroes and 3 villains
